FIRST ATTEMPT

Lovely...on @BBCymruFyw about how book shops have been...during the lockdown. '#..BookshopWeek' '#SupportBookShops' '#LoveReading'

CORRECT TRANSLATION

Lovely stories on @BBCymruFyw about how book shops have been cheering us up during the lockdown. '#IndependentBookshopWeek' '#SupportBookShops' '#LoveReading'

CORRECT TRANSLATION

perffaith - perfect
